title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A red car drives down a busy city street with a bus and a truck in the background.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 0.8 m/s). There are 22 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and cautiously, braking frequently to avoid collisions with other vehicles. The ego vehicle needs to be extra vigilant and maintain a safe distance from other vehicles to ensure safe driving.
